Travels from rarer medium to denser medium & angle of incidence should be greater than critical angle

question: Stress-strain curve of concrete is
options: A perfect straight line up to failure
Straight line up to 0.002% strain value and then parabolic up to failure
Parabolic up to 0.002% strain value and then a straight line up to failure
Hyperbolic up to 0.002% strain value and then a straight line up to failure
correctAnswer: Parabolic up to 0.002% strain value and then a straight line up to failure

question: The distance between theoretical cut-off point and actual cut-off point in respect of the curtailment of reinforcement of reinforced concrete beams should not be less than

50 x dia of bar or effective depth whichever is greater
correctAnswer: 12 x dia of bar or effective depth whichever is greater

correctAnswer: Only steel bars will resist tension
